text: The Aussie women's team fought off an early lead by their American rivals and overhauled the field down the stretch to recapture the Olympic freestyle relay title since they did so in 2004.

Dominating the race from the start, Phelps held off a final showdown from Lochte on the freestyle leg to claim his sixteenth gold and twentieth career medal in 1:54.27
